blogPost.excerpt:
True Facts Shirts: https://ze-true-store.myshopify.com/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/truefacts
Sign up for Curiosity Stream: https://curiositystream.com/zefrank

CREDITS:

This video was made in collaboration with Benedikt Pleyer, who is a gifted microscopist and has a wonderful contagious passion for discovering the incredible worlds that exist all around us. He has introduced me to all sorts of new creatures and I am fortunate to have met him. 
http://www.instagram.com/nomadic_nostoc

Kita Williams reached out to me almost a year ago with her amazing Tardigrade footage, and I am so happy that she did. She has a knack for capturing these animals in way that gives them so much personality!
http://www.twitter.com/SeaSpongeCake

Bob Goldstein runs a lab at UNC Chapel Hill and has done incredible work on the Tardigrade (and much more.) He was kind enough to review my work to make sure I didn't screw the science up too much! I wish I could have included more of his work on the evolution of Tardigrades - but I hope to do that in a future episode on arthropods.
https://goldsteinlab.weebly.com/

Thank you to the following for publishing their imagesunder the CC license, it is a huge contribution to science communication.

Water bear (tardigrade), Hypsibius dujardini, scanning electron micrograph by Bob Goldstein and Vicky Madden.
Scanning electron micrograph of active hydrated Echiniscoides sigismundi by Thomas L. Sørensen-Hygum, Robyn M. Stuart, Aslak Jørgensen & Nadja Møbjerg.
New Echiniscidae (Heterotardigrada) from Amber Mountain (Northern Madagascar) by Gąsiorek P, Vončina K (2019) 

Thank you to all of my Patreon patrons for the patience, support and feedback

MUSIC: 
https://soundcloud.com/querflote​
“BackBay Lounge” by Kevin MacLeod
https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/


Additional footage used under license from:
Pond5.com
Shutterstock.com
blogPost.body:
True Facts Shirts: https://ze-true-store.myshopify.com/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/truefacts
Sign up for Curiosity Stream: https://curiositystream.com/zefrank

CREDITS:

This video was made in collaboration with Benedikt Pleyer, who is a gifted microscopist and has a wonderful contagious passion for discovering the incredible worlds that exist all around us. He has introduced me to all sorts of new creatures and I am fortunate to have met him. 
http://www.instagram.com/nomadic_nostoc

Kita Williams reached out to me almost a year ago with her amazing Tardigrade footage, and I am so happy that she did. She has a knack for capturing these animals in way that gives them so much personality!
http://www.twitter.com/SeaSpongeCake

Bob Goldstein runs a lab at UNC Chapel Hill and has done incredible work on the Tardigrade (and much more.) He was kind enough to review my work to make sure I didn't screw the science up too much! I wish I could have included more of his work on the evolution of Tardigrades - but I hope to do that in a future episode on arthropods.
https://goldsteinlab.weebly.com/

Thank you to the following for publishing their imagesunder the CC license, it is a huge contribution to science communication.

Water bear (tardigrade), Hypsibius dujardini, scanning electron micrograph by Bob Goldstein and Vicky Madden.
Scanning electron micrograph of active hydrated Echiniscoides sigismundi by Thomas L. Sørensen-Hygum, Robyn M. Stuart, Aslak Jørgensen & Nadja Møbjerg.
New Echiniscidae (Heterotardigrada) from Amber Mountain (Northern Madagascar) by Gąsiorek P, Vončina K (2019) 

Thank you to all of my Patreon patrons for the patience, support and feedback

blogPost.title: True Facts: The Incredible Tardigrade
blogPost.author: zefrank1

localize.title: 真实的事实。不可思议的沙丁鱼
localize.description:
True Facts Shirts: https://ze-true-store.myshopify.com/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/truefacts
注册好奇心流：https://curiositystream.com/zefrank

CREDITS:

这段视频是与本尼迪克特-普利耶合作制作的 他是一位天才的显微镜专家 他对发现我们周围不可思议的世界有着奇妙的感染力。他向我介绍了各种新的生物，我很幸运能遇到他。
http://www.instagram.com/nomadic_nostoc

一年前，Kita Williams向我推荐了她拍摄的Tardigrade，我很高兴她能这么做。她很擅长捕捉这些动物，并赋予它们很多个性。
http://www.twitter.com/SeaSpongeCake

鲍勃-戈尔茨坦在UNC Chapel Hill经营着一个实验室，并在Tardigrades上做了令人难以置信的工作(还有更多。)他很友好地审查了我的工作，以确保我没有把科学搞得太糟！我希望我能把他在Tardigrades进化上的更多工作包括进去，但我希望在未来的节肢动物节目中能做到这一点。我希望我可以包括更多的他的工作在Tardigrades的进化 - 但我希望在未来的节肢动物的情节做。
https://goldsteinlab.weebly.com/

感谢以下人士发布他们的图片
在CC许可证下，它是一个巨大的贡献。
科学交流。

水熊（tardigrade），Hypsibius dujardini。
扫描电子照片 
Bob Goldstein和Vicky Madden。


活性水合物的扫描电子显微图。
Echiniscoides sigismundi，作者：Thomas L. Sørensen-Hygum。
Robyn M. Stuart, Aslak Jørgensen & Nadja Møbjerg.


来自琥珀的新棘鱼科(Heterotardigrada) 
Mountain (Northern Madagascar) by Gąsiorek P, Vončina K (2019) 

感谢我所有的赞助人，感谢他们对我的支持。
耐心、支持和反馈

音乐。
https://soundcloud.com/querflote
"BackBay Lounge" by 
Kevin MacLeod
https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/


使用的额外镜头 
许可从。


Pond5.com
Shutterstock.com

localize.title: 真實的事實。不可思議的沙丁魚
localize.description:
True Facts Shirts: https://ze-true-store.myshopify.com/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/truefacts
註冊好奇心流：https://curiositystream.com/zefrank

CREDITS:

這段視頻是與本尼迪克特-普利耶合作製作的 他是一位天才的顯微鏡專家 他對發現我們周圍不可思議的世界有着奇妙的感染力。他向我介紹了各種新的生物，我很幸運能遇到他。
http://www.instagram.com/nomadic_nostoc

一年前，Kita Williams向我推薦了她拍攝的Tardigrade，我很高興她能這麼做。她很擅長捕捉這些動物，並賦予它們很多個性。
http://www.twitter.com/SeaSpongeCake

鮑勃-戈爾茨坦在UNC Chapel Hill經營着一個實驗室，並在Tardigrades上做了令人難以置信的工作(還有更多。)他很友好地審查了我的工作，以確保我沒有把科學搞得太糟！我希望我能把他在Tardigrades進化上的更多工作包括進去，但我希望在未來的節肢動物節目中能做到這一點。我希望我可以包括更多的他的工作在Tardigrades的進化 - 但我希望在未來的節肢動物的情節做。
https://goldsteinlab.weebly.com/

感謝以下人士發佈他們的圖片
在CC許可證下，它是一個巨大的貢獻。
科學交流。

水熊（tardigrade），Hypsibius dujardini。
掃描電子照片 
Bob Goldstein和Vicky Madden。


活性水合物的掃描電子顯微圖。
Echiniscoides sigismundi，作者：Thomas L. Sørensen-Hygum。
Robyn M. Stuart, Aslak Jørgensen & Nadja Møbjerg.


來自琥珀的新棘魚科(Heterotardigrada) 
Mountain (Northern Madagascar) by Gąsiorek P, Vončina K (2019) 

感謝我所有的贊助人，感謝他們對我的支持。
耐心、支持和反饋

音樂。
https://soundcloud.com/querflote
"BackBay Lounge" by 
Kevin MacLeod
https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/


使用的額外鏡頭 
許可從。


Pond5.com
Shutterstock.com
